content:
Great, for B2B marketing and sales, you can start by searching for trade publications that cover topics related to marketing and sales in the UK, Ireland, and Israel. Some examples of trade publications in this space include:

* B2B Marketing
* The Drum
* Marketing Week
* Irish Marketing Journal
* Business Insider
* The Marketing Society
* The Marketing Institute of Ireland
* Marketing Magazine
* The Marketer
* Sales Management
* The Marketer
* B2B Marketing

You can use online databases such as Cision or Muck Rack to find contact information for journalists and publications that cover your industry or topic in the UK, Ireland and Israel. You can also search Google, social media, and industry websites to find relevant contacts.

You can also look for relevant publications and journalists on LinkedIn and Twitter, this can help you find contact information and learn more about the publications and journalists you're targeting.

Additionally, you can also look at your competitors' press coverage to identify journalists and publications that have covered similar topics in the past.

Please let me know if you have any more questions or if there is anything else I can help with.
